source:
TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_SEQ_00<tab>Bert is not-so-quietly confident that you have already chosen to cast your vote for him.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_SEQ_00<tab>* <var 1A 02 /var>Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.<var 1A 01 /var>

Bert n'imagine pas une seconde ne pas recevoir votre vote.

source:
TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_SEQ_01<tab>You speak with Bert, and inform him that it is his proposal that has earned your vote of confidence. Clearly believing this to be the inevitable conclusion from the start, he strides off to report to Lisette, all but assuming that you will be following close behind.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_SEQ_01<tab>Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

Vous avez choisi d'offrir votre soutien à la solution proposée par Bert. Pour valider votre vote, retournez auprès de Lisette, à l'amphithéâtre de Mih Khetto.

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_SEQ_02<tab>Though she professes to remain impartial, Lady Lisette's pensive look betrays her dismay that you have chosen to support someone other than her dear sister. The contest is far from over, however, as many votes remain to be counted. You resolve to enjoy the festivities as you wait for Lady Lisette and her colleagues to declare a victor.
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_SEQ_02<tab>A voté<var 1D /var>! Il ne vous reste plus qu'à attendre la fin du scrutin pour découvrir qui remportera la majorité des suffrages et sera nommé messager de l'amour en chef pour cette édition de la Valention.

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>Please note that once you accept this quest, you will be unable to accept the quests “A Vote for Astrid” and “A Vote for Rodrigault.”
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>En acceptant cette quête, vous ne pourrez plus commencer les quêtes “Un vote pour Astrid” et “Un vote pour Rodrigault”.

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Furthermore, be aware that only votes cast during the designated voting period will count towards the final tally.
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Veuillez également noter que seuls les votes effectués durant la période déterminée seront pris en compte pour le résultat final.

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_002<tab>Ho there, friend! I had a feeling you'd be back! I know not what the others have suggested, but there's simply no way it could hold a candle to the sheer boldness and brilliance of Bert the Beloved's advice!
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_002<tab>Ha ha, je savais bien que tu voterais pour moi<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_Q1_000_000<tab>You can only vote once.
What will you say?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_Q1_000_000<tab>Vous ne pouvez voter qu'une seule fois.
Que faites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_A1_000_002<tab>What is it that you propose again?
TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_A1_000_003<tab>I'd like to have a moment to think things over.
TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_003<tab>Many thanks, my friend! I can assure you that you've chosen the winning chocobo in this race.
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_003<tab>Voilà une décision pleine de lucidité<var 1D /var>! Avec ma proposition, les soucis de notre homme masqué vont s'envoler illico presto<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_004<tab>And with that, I'd best be off to the amphitheatre to notify Lady Lisette of my forthcoming victory. You'll be joining me to celebrate, of course? Of course you will!
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_004<tab>Maintenant, on doit aller informer Lisette que tu as choisi de voter pour moi. Suis-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_005<tab>What's that you say!? You've forgotten my infallible advice so soon? Ahaha, but I jest! Of course, I'm more than happy to expound once more if it will lead you to the obvious conclusion.
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_005<tab>Tu hésites encore, hein<var 1D /var>? Pas de problème, ça peut arriver à tout le monde. Écoute bien ma proposition, et rends-toi à l'évidence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_006<tab>So we're dealing with a man who's diligent, devoted, and distinguished with regard to his duties. On the other hand, because of this, some find him something of a one-trick chocobo, as it were.
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_006<tab>Comme je t'ai déjà dit, j'ai pas mal réfléchi à tout ça, et je suis persuadé que notre gars devrait faire un effort pour... <var 1A 02 /var>avoir d'autres passe-temps<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_007<tab>And so, as I see it, the answer is clear as day: he need simply find himself a new pastime!
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_007<tab>Il a l'air très con<var 16 /var>scien<var 16 /var>cieux dans son boulot, et c'est tout à son honneur, mais du coup, y a pas mal de gens qui le trouvent rébarbatif. C'est dommage, tu crois pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_008<tab>This would afford him an opportunity to go out and meet new faces, and give him a fresh topic to broach with any special someone who strikes his fancy!
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_008<tab>Avec des centres d'intérêt variés, il pourrait sûrement avoir des sujets de discussion plus diversifiés, ce qui le rendrait bien plus attirant aux yeux des personnes sus<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>bles de lui plaire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_009<tab>As for what might be appropriate, the answer is clear as day─woodworking! After all, there is nothing a young lady appreciates more than a man who is handy about the house, no? Talk about killing two ziz with one stone!
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_009<tab>Il pourrait se mettre... à la menuiserie, par exemple. Crois-moi, avoir quelqu'un à la maison qui sait bricoler, ça en fait rêver plus d'une... et plus d'un<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_010<tab>Ah, I can just feel the flames of passion beginning to spark and sizzle! I know not what silly plans my colleagues are proposing, but I can trust you to vote for the obvious choice, yes? But of course I can!
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_BERT_000_010<tab>Si tu votes pour moi, tu peux être <var 08 E905 ((sûre)) ((sûr)) /var> que le cœur de notre tourtereau en manque d'affection sera bientôt embrasé par les feux de l'amour, ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_ASTRID_000_011<tab>And here I was hoping you'd find it in your heart to vote for me. Oh, well. I suppose I can only hope that others rally to my cause.
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_ASTRID_000_011<tab>Je suis déçue de ne pas avoir reçu vos faveurs, mais je remporterai peut-être la victoire finale, qui sait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_RODRIGAULT_000_012<tab>It is most regrettable that I was unable to convince you of the merits of my case. Still, I am confident that the vast majority will see reason and cast their votes in my favor.
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_RODRIGAULT_000_012<tab>Quelle cruelle désillusion de ne pas avoir trouvé les mots pour vous convaincre... Mais j'ai encore toutes mes chances de coiffer mes collègues au poteau.

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_LISETTE_000_020<tab>Hm? Surely you cannot be serious! Anyone with half their wits about them could see that─ah...that you have deemed Bert the Beloved most deserving of your support in this endeavor!
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_LISETTE_000_020<tab>Vous avez donc décidé de confier votre vote à Bert<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_LISETTE_000_021<tab>As far as I'm concerned, the man's ideas are typically worth about as much as a sack of stale popotoes. But far be it from me to dissuade you! After all, there is a first time for everything.
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_LISETTE_000_021<tab>A voté<var 1D /var>! Bert, voilà une voix de plus dans ta besace, et non des moindres. Fé<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tions<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_LISETTE_000_022<tab>Mind you, it is far too early to declare the contest won. There are countless other adventurers and Gridanian citizens who have yet to weigh in, after all. When the final results have been counted and compiled, pray speak with me anew.
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_LISETTE_000_022<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, merci pour votre coopération. Nous attendons encore beaucoup de votes de la part des Gridaniens et des aventuriers par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>pants, donc je vous demanderai un peu de patience jusqu'à l'annonce du résultat final<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_LISETTE_000_023<tab>As an added incentive, it has been decided that once the victor is declared, the town will be redecorated with new ornaments of their choosing. Pray look forward to it, my dear friend!
target: TEXT_FESVLT603_03754_LISETTE_000_023<tab>Au fait, pour féliciter notre futur vainqueur, j'ai décidé de redécorer l'amphithéâtre et ses environs avec des ornementations de son choix. J'espère que le résultat vous plaira<var 1D /var>!♪
